main.title: We'll find a solution
main.desc: Clearly the best renovation company in the market.

s1.name: Who are we?
s1.title: Our company specializes in renovation.
s1.line1: Are you looking to renovate your interior to give a new life to your house or apartment? Trust KP BAT.
s1.line2: We provide you with a team of qualified and experienced professionals to carry out all your renovation projects, from simple painting refreshes to complete renovations.
s1.line3: We offer a wide range of services to meet all your needs: painting, flooring, plumbing, electricity, carpentry, kitchen and bathroom design, etc.
s1.line4: We work with high-quality materials to ensure a durable and aesthetic result. We listen to your needs and expectations to offer you a tailor-made service that is adapted to your budget and constraints.

s2.title: Our lastest works
s2.desc: Browse our gallery, and see why we're worthy of your trust!

s3.title: Our Services
s3.desc: We provide services and products that set high standards for quality, reliability, durability.

s4.title: Get in Touch with Us
s4.desc: If you have any questions, please write to us!
